alert.note: Alert for O'Brien (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:53PM CDT until July 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR EASTERN OSCEOLA...DICKINSON...NORTHERN CLAY...NORTHEASTERN O`BRIEN AND SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Park, or 9 miles west of Spirit Lake, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. From 5:40-5:50 pm, an emergency manager reported 10 minutes of 60+ mph gusts northwest of Everly. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Fostoria around 555 PM CDT. Milford, Arnolds Park, Okoboji, Wahpeton and West Okoboji around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Spirit Lake, Orleans, Terril and Superior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
